item.title: On-chain Wealth Turns Deadly: Crypto Kidnapping in Paris Forces Victim to Hand Over Ledger Wallet
item.description:
Paris investigators have handled a kidnapping in Maisons-Alfort where a 23-year-old crypto holder was forced to surrender cash and a Ledger wallet, the tenth crypto-linked abduction in France this year amid a wider European rise in violent ‘wrench attacks’ against digital asset owners.

 

The post On-chain Wealth Turns Deadly: Crypto Kidnapping in Paris Forces Victim to Hand Over Ledger Wallet appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: ChatGPT Predicts the Price of XRP, Pi Coin and Cardano by the End of 2025
item.description:
ChatGPT predicts 2025 could deliver outsized gains across the crypto market. Bitcoin has topped $111,814, while forecasts point to XRP at $10, PI near $8, ADA at $10, and Solana’s SOLX rallying after its presale. The projections reflect technical signals, legal clarity, and improving macro conditions.

item.title: Uber Races Into AI Data Labeling as Meta’s $14.8B Scale Deal Sparks Mass Defections – Who’s Next?
item.description:
Uber has widened its AI ambitions, renaming its data-services division Uber AI Solutions and offering external access to proprietary datasets, clickworker labeling teams and project-automation software. The expansion has come as Meta’s Scale stake prompts model builders to seek neutral partners.

item.description:

item.description:
ChatGPT has integrated 38 live technical, on-chain, and sentiment indicators to assess ADA’s course: price has fallen 13 % to $0.58, RSI sits near 30, yet almost $1 bn has moved off exchanges, and whales have purchased 310 m tokens, hinting at potential relief if support holds.
